# @deno/shim-deno

[`Deno` namespace](https://doc.deno.land/builtin/stable) shim for Node.js.

See
[PROGRESS.md](https://github.com/denoland/node_deno_shims/blob/main/packages/shim-deno/PROGRESS.md)
